content: The CDISC Exchange Technologies team are looking at rules/triggers for events for the next version of the CDISC ODM (v2). We have had some thoughts about adopting CQL as a common model for describing rules using the ODM archetypes. Is there someone who could join a call in two weeks who could speak with us about the suitability or otherwise of CQL for these purposes? It would be very much appreciated
Hi @Geoff Low , happy to join a call to discuss, feel free to PM me here or send email directly.
